contentfulBlogPost.title: Join us! Our first OSHW talk: Open Source Nostalgia

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Join OSHWA this Wednesday, April 22nd, at 1:00 PM MDT (3:00 PM EDT / 12:00 PM PDT / 7:00 PM UTC) for a live virtual talk: ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Open Source Nostalgia","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Speaker: Libi Rose Striegl","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Using open source projects to enable modern use of retro-tech is a foundational part of my art practice. Open source practices are a central part of my teaching. This forms a base for art and teaching around technology that is empowering and joyful while still coming\nfrom a place of critical learning.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"OSHWA YouTube channel: ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_V6IvwN25x7fyaOCfMrHfg"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_V6IvwN25x7fyaOCfMrHfg","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"\nDate/Time converter: ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Open+Source+Nostalgia+talk&iso=20200422T19"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Open+Source+Nostalgia+talk&iso=20200422T19","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Join #oshwtalks on the OSHWA (@ohsummit) discord at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://discordapp.com/invite/38C57Uf"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://discordapp.com/invite/38C57Uf","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
